documentation.author: Steve Wade
documentation.purpose:
This rule is designed to place an order called "GWN Start Watch" that will be sent outbound to Get Well Network (GWN). The rule is triggered when a medication is admistered with a PRN Reason that includes the word "Pain". When GWN gets the "GWN Start Watch" order they will begin a timer that will present two questions to the patient 45 minutes after the order is received. One question is for the patient to rate their pain level, the other question asks if the pain level is acceptable. If the patient indicates "No" to the pain level question, another rule is evoked, BCC_GWN_CPD_PAIN_LEVEL.
11/9/16 - Rule implemented for SJN only. Will not fire for patients in units JN A2n and JN A2WA 11/30/2016 - Rule modified; Order that is placed changed from GWN Start Watch to GWN Start Pain Watch. Also, Action Group added to Complete all but most recent GWN Start Pain Watch orders.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_DETAIL_E
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS where order detail ORDER_DETAIL QUALIFIER LIST1 and OPT_LIST2

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_LOC_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL that QUAL in DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_INCOMING_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS where order detail ORDER_DETAIL QUALIFIER LIST1 and OPT_LIST2

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PREVIOUS_ACTION_L
templateDefinitions.definition: If previous action of ACTION_NAME was executed for SCOPE OPT_LINK initiated by PERSONNEL user in last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT
templateDefinitions.description: If previous action of ACTION_NAME was executed for SCOPE OPT_LINK initiated by PERSONNEL user in last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with order status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS on OPT_SCOPE OPT_LINK whose date criteria is OPT_QUAL OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT from the anchor OPT_ANCHOR_DT_TM.

column.value: link to other template by the same accession_id
link to other template by the same encounter_id

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_NEW
templateDefinitions.definition: Order PROCEDURE PRIORITY and bill code CODE with CHART order comment COMMENT

statements.statement: select ocs.mnemonic,catalog_type=cv.display from order_catalog oc, order_catalog_synonym ocs, code_value cv plan oc where oc.orderable_type_flag not in (2,3,6,8,11) and oc.active_ind = 1 and oc.catalog_type_cd > 0 join cv where cv.code_value = oc.catalog_type_cd and cv.cdf_meaning != "PHARMACY " join ocs where ocs.catalog_cd = oc.catalog_cd and ocs.mnemonic = oc.primary_mnemonic order cnvtupper(ocs.mnemonic)
SELECT C1.DISPLAY_KEY,C1.DESCRIPTION,C1.CODE_VALUE FROM CODE_VALUE C1 WHERE C1.CODE_SET = 2054 AND C1.ACTIVE_IND=1 ORDER C1.DISPLAY_KEY
SELECT C1.DESCRIPTION FROM CODE_VALUE C1 WHERE CODE_SET = 13028 ORDER C1.CODE_VALUE

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SETUP_UPDATE_ORDERS_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Setup GROUP_NAME with ACTION_TYPE orders for QUAL in LINK with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT
templateDefinitions.description: Prepare modify/cancel actions to be sent to the Order Server

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALL_ORDER_SERVER_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Call order server with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT
templateDefinitions.description: Send orders and actions from prior templates to the Order Server
